comment: It s a girl ! Seminane , one of the gorillas in Virunga National Park in the Democratic Republic of the Congo , has given birth to her first child ... a baby girl . The gorilla population in Virunga has been decimated due to war , poaching , and terorrism , but is slowly rebuilding ! <URL>
